title: Apple’s just-announced 5K Studio Display sees launch discount at up to $115 off
content:
Today, Apple took to the stage in order to unveil a new collection of devices at its spring Peek Performance event this afternoon. One of the most exciting reveals is the new Apple Studio Display, which is already seeing a notable launch discount via trusted authorized retailer Expercom. Taking up to $115 off the all-new release, you can get all of the details on the Apple Studio Display deal below.

more…

The post Apple’s just-announced 5K Studio Display sees launch discount at up to $115 off appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: After being announced just a few hours before, the an Apple Studio Display deal has arrived via Expercom taking up to $115 off.
